name: Beach Hoodie
description:
Called a "beach hoodie" due to it's soft and lightweight design.  You don't have to go to the beach to wear this, we promise.

We strongly suggest you order a size above your shirt size if you are on borderline.  For example, if you wear a medium shirt and it fits you snugly (is that a word?), then you should order a large.  But, if you wear a medium shirt and there's room for you to grow, a medium hoodie should work for you.

name: KEEP QUIET SHIRT
description:
We thought these were gone....but after digging through some wreckage and debris, we found a few.  Only Men's Small and Xtra Small is available, but the Xtra Small is equivalent to a Girl's Small.

Dimensions for Xtra Small:
Width - 16.5"
Length - 26" 
Sleeve - 7"

name: Ten Years Of Protomen Show Poster
description: This is the show poster for The Protomen's 10th Anniversary show.  Look at all of those little pieces of history on one poster.  A very limited amount of these were made and there aren't many left!!!

name: Breaking Out Shirt
description: In celebration of the B side single "Breaking Out (2012 Edit)" on the new cassette, we figured a new shirt was in order. TULTEX BRAND COAL SHIRT. Size chart: Dudes Dames If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here.

name: Original Grid Logo Shirt *Limited Edition
description:
*AS OF 10/3/13 ONLY 8 REMAIN.*

This is a mildly updated version of The Protomen's first shirt from 2005. 

It is hand printed on a heather grey American Apparel TShirt.

Only 298 of this color will be printed!

name: ACT I VINYL (2ND PRESSING)
description: *AS OF 11/06/13, 300 REMAIN* Due to an overwhelming demand, we decided to reprint Act I on vinyl. What's different this time around? Instead of split color blue/red, we changed the color to black and made it 180 Gram Audiophile. What does that mean? That means it's just as pretty as the first pressing and it sounds even better. Also, this comes with an insert poster containing artwork made for the original CD release, but never was included. Don't be one of those people that say "I wish I had bought that when I could." There is a limited amount and these will disappear. If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here.

name: Makeup And Vanity Set Presents: VINYL
description: *AS OF 11/06/13, 100 REMAIN." This is the first vinyl pressing of Makeup And Vanity Set's 8-bit remix of The Protomen's first album. Just looking at this picture disc will make you want to slam dance to some sweet 8-bit jams. Only 100 remain. Don't miss out! If you want to add INSURANCE and TRACKING, click here.

name: ACT I VINYL (2ND PRESSING) & MAVS COMBO
description: Get both of the vinyls at a $5 discount!

name: El Corazon Poster
description: This is a silk-screened limited edition run from a show with Supercommuter and Danimal Cannon. There were only 100 pressed and 27 remain. If you like it, get it while you can! Approximately 25" x 19" If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here.

name: The Protomen Present: A Night of Queen
description: Queen jams. We tried to resurrect Freddie and failed, so we decided to just make a live album in honour of him and the rest of the gang. Track listing: 01. Intro 02. Flash 03. Battle Theme 04. Don't Stop Me Now 05. Killer Queen 06. Hammer to Fall 07. One Vision 08. Somebody to Love 09. Princes of the Universe 10. Death on Two Legs 11. I Want to Break Free 12. Scandal 13. I Want it All 14. The Show Must Go On 15. Under Pressure 16. Bohemian Rhapsody 17. Due Vendetta 18. Outro If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here.

name: A Night Of Queen - Shirt
description: LIKE THE ALBUM COVER SO MUCH THAT YOU NEED A SHIRT WITH IT on the front and the track listing on the back? TULTEX BRAND COAL SHIRT. If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here.

name: The Protomen Present: A Night of Queen + Shirt
description: Like the album cover so much that you need a shirt with it as well as the CD? And you also have to have the track listing on the back? AND YOU LIKE TO SAVE A DOLLAR? Seems you have come to the right place. Tultex brand coal shirt. If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here.

name: The Protomen Present: A Night of Queen Show poster
description: Want one of the few posters printed for the show? Get it while you can. Only 11 remain. POSTER DIMENSIONS: 25" x 19" (design is 24" x 18") 4 color screen print (4th layer is Silver) Printed on 100# "pure White" French Paper. If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here.

name: 525-SEA Shirt
description: In honor of the infamous "Tasty Vein" saga that coincided with the release of the "Makeup And Vanity Set Presents: The Protomen" CD, this limited run shirt was made. This (Tultex brand) charcoal shirt will definitely classify you as one that knows the real history of The Protomen. What's a "Tasty Vein", you ask? Click here for a history lesson. Only 9 of these are still available! DAMES' MEASUREMENTS: (click below!) If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here.

name: MAVS Vinyl & 525-SEA shirt combo
description: Want the MAVS vinyl and the 525-SEA shirt with less clicking while saving a dollar? In honor of the infamous "Tasty Vein" saga that coincided with the release of the "Makeup And Vanity Set Presents: The Protomen" CD, this limited run shirt was made. This (Tultex brand) charcoal shirt will definitely classify you as one that knows the real history of The Protomen. What's a "Tasty Vein", you ask? Click here for a history lesson. Only 9 of these are still available! DAMES' MEASUREMENTS: (click below!) If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here.

name: Chicago Metro Show Poster w/ I Fight Dragons
description: DIMENSIONS: 19" x 25" (design is 18" x 24") 3 Color Screen Print Printed on 140# "Madero Beach" French Paper. The Protomen I Fight Dragons The Kickback @The Metro in Chicago, IL 12-17-11 Only 1000 were printed and 200 are still available. This is historic proof that it wasn't a cow after all. If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here.

name: ACT II: THE FATHER OF DEATH CD
description: The 2009 prequel to "ACT I", which was released in 2005. Jam list: 1. Intermission 2. The Good Doctor 3. Father of Death 4. The Hounds 5. The State Vs. Thomas Light 6. Give Us The Rope 7. How The World Fell Under Darkness 8. Breaking Out 9. Keep Quiet 10. Light Up The Night 11. The Fall 12. Here Comes The Arm If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here. Share

name: Act I CD
description: The beginning of it all....or the 2nd chapter.....or the last chapter? Regardless, the first CD released in 2005. Contains these jams that your Grandma has been blasting at breakfast for years: I: Hope Rides Alone IIa: Funeral For A Son IIb: Unrest in the House of Light III: The Will of One IV: Vengeance V: The Stand VI: Sons of Fate EPILOGUE: Due Vendetta If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here. Share

name: ACT II SHIRT & CD (COMBO)
description: After a year of fighting with several machines in different cities to make this shirt, we finally won. This is a 2-sided 5 color screen print a Tultex Coal colored shirt (nearly black). This is the first Protomen shirt with an image on the back. That makes it even better, right? Available for the dudes and the dames. ALSO, you get "Act II: The Father of Death" CD with all of its 24 page full color glory storybook. Already have one? Surely you have a girl/boy/grandma/landlord/doctor/previous-tenant-body-burner-in-the-furnace neighbor/best friend that deserves one as well. DAMES' MEASUREMENTS: (click below!) If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here. Share

description: After a year of fighting with several machines in different cities to make this shirt, we finally won. name: Light Up the Night Zippo-Style Lighter
description: Smoking is bad for you and probably burning down cities is as well. But you still need a few of these in order to earn respect in your community, your family, and your football team. These are shipped empty so DO NOT ATTEMPT TO IGNITE BEFORE ADDING FLUID. This is your warning. If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here. Share

name: Wrist Protectors
description: Protect your wrist as you throw punches to an ignorant civilization. Choose between two phrases from "The Good Doctor". Or get one for each wrist so they don't become jealous and you don't become asymmetrical. Black band w/ white script- WITH THESE HANDS WE WILL DESTROY White band w/ black script- WITH THESE HANDS WE WILL REBUILD Get one for $3.00 or save a buck and get one of each for $5.00! If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here. Share

name: Elecman Shirt
description: Check out this mean shirt of original artwork from the "Hope Rides Alone" video. He has no remorse. Available in black. If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here. Share

name: ACT II Poster
description: Movie style poster for "ACT II: THE FATHER OF DEATH". Approximately 12" x 19". If you want to add INSURANCE and/or TRACKING, click here. Share

name: TRACKING + INSURANCE (Add on)
description:
Want your order to be covered when the robot delivery workers turn on their human colleagues and destroy all packages?  Add this to your cart.

Just want tracking for $1.00? Select your option.

Only available for orders being delivered to the United States of America.

If you want tracking and insurance for an international order, contact us.
